name: tracey pooh
body:
yay, we did it! thanks Harry Stark for TRL-ing with me. We lost Hunter’s participation today due to a sudden illness but we only had one rider show up to join us so it was OK.

we 3 made it to, up and down Mt. Diablo (halfway point) and managed to avoid any rain luckily. hooray!

i’m updating the route sheet now with the *real* mileage numbers now…. 😎
